content.text: The ElizaOS platform continues to expand its capabilities with the addition of new plugins and features.
New Arbitrage Plugin allows for cryptocurrency arbitrage trading across decentralized exchanges, built with security features and tested on Ethereum mainnet.
Mind Network Plugin and Quick Intel Plugin aid in token security analysis and improve integration with the Eliza platform.
Introduction of Bittensor Bitmind API and Form Chain Plugin further enhance Eliza's blockchain and AI capabilities.
A notable increase in the cryptocurrency market over the past 24 hours indicates a positive trend.
Bitcoin's current price is $104,692, showing a 10.93% increase in daily trading.
Ethereum sees a major surge with a 32.91% gain, bringing its price to $3,330.07.

text.title: Development and Bug Fixes in ElizaOS

content.text: The team tackled various bugs and integration improvements to optimize platform performance.
Resolved issues in the Twitter homeTimeline name parsing and topics formatting for a seamless user experience.
Enabled turbo caching for faster build processes and reduced recompile times.
